Flub.Name: Amount
Flub.Description: The amount of sedimentation on each layer.

Flub.Name: Drift
Flub.Description: Add a superficial multi-directional drift or buildup to the sedimentation.

Flub.Name: Strength
Flub.Description: The strength or offset of the drift.

Flub.Name: Seed
Flub.Description: The randomization pattern or seed for the node's process.
